4. Metadata: are you collecting any metadata with your experiments? Are there any domain specific data repositories in your field that add metadata? If there are, best to read their submission guidelines already to find best practices on how to document your data
7. Sharing: If there are no suitable domain specific repositories for your data you can use KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) for data preservation and sharing.
